sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) With an Easy (1 difficulty die) Mechanics check, the character may harvest components from a functioning device to repair a broken one, without breaking the functioning device. This allows the character to repair a broken device without having required spare parts, raw materials, or repair kits (the initial check does not suffer penalties for lacking repair kits, either). This only works, however, if the functioning device is at least the same size and technological level as the device being repaired (it is impossible to repair a starship with a blaster pistol, or a lightsaber with parts from a water wheel).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Redundant Systems</name> <number>TAL0001210</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 12:20:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e94bc82a2f7f1490e0f497eef699b631</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 12:20:22</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
